Description: Checks that each customer_id in tsb.customer_data_bank is unique, ensuring no duplicate primary key values exist
Custom_SQL: SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks that all rows in tsb.customer_data_bank have a non-null customer_id, as required by the primary key constraint
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_id IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the full_name column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE full_name IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the date_of_birth column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the gender column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the address column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE address IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the phone_number column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the email_address column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the national_id_or_passport_number column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the occupation column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE occupation IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the customer_type column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE customer_type IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the account_numbers column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the age column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the created_by column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_by IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the created_on column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the modified_by column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_by IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the modified_on column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE modified_on IS NULL

Description: Checks for missing values in the status column, which may indicate incomplete customer records
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NULL

Description: Checks that email_address values conform to a basic email format, helping to ensure valid contact information
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL AND email_address !~* '^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$'

Description: Checks that phone_number values contain only valid characters (digits, plus, hyphen, space), helping to ensure valid contact information
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND phone_number !~* '^[0-9+\- ]+$'

Description: Checks that gender values are within the expected domain (e.g., Male, Female, Other), helping to ensure standardized data
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE gender IS NOT NULL AND gender NOT IN ('Male','Female','Other')

Description: Checks that status values are within expected domain (e.g., Active, Inactive, Suspended), helping to ensure standardized data
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE status IS NOT NULL AND status NOT IN ('Active','Inactive','Suspended')

Description: Checks that age values are within a reasonable range (e.g., 0 to 120), helping to detect outliers or data entry errors
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE age IS NOT NULL AND (age < 0 OR age > 120)

Description: Checks for duplicate email_address values, which may indicate multiple records for the same customer
Custom_SQL: SELECT email_address, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL GROUP BY email_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks for duplicate national_id_or_passport_number values, which may indicate multiple records for the same customer
Custom_SQL: SELECT national_id_or_passport_number, COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE national_id_or_passport_number IS NOT NULL GROUP BY national_id_or_passport_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

Description: Checks that created_on is not after modified_on, helping to ensure logical timestamps
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE created_on IS NOT NULL AND modified_on IS NOT NULL AND created_on > modified_on

Description: Checks that date_of_birth values are not in the future, helping to ensure logical birth dates
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE date_of_birth IS NOT NULL AND date_of_birth > CURRENT_DATE

Description: Checks that account_numbers values contain only valid characters (digits, commas, hyphens, spaces), helping to ensure valid account references
Custom_SQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsb.customer_data_bank WHERE account_numbers IS NOT NULL AND account_numbers !~* '^[0-9,\- ]+$'
